title: Peter Andre insists son Junior will finish school before he can get a job
text:

Peter Andre has dished the dirt on life as a dad, saying he's really strict and wants his son Junior to finish school before "he can do what he likes".

The Mysterious Girl hit maker, 46, follows in the footsteps of his own strict dad, and said he was told what to do by his parent.

As Junior is approaching the age of being able to work, he wants him to finish education before moving onto the next step of his life.

Speaking exclusively to Mirror Online at the Pride of Britain Awards, he shared: "He needs to finish his school and then he can do what he likes when he finishes school.

"I'm really strict like that - maybe a bit too strict. When things come in I'm like, 'No, no', cause I wasn't allowed.

"Dad made me finish school and I got to do what he told me to do.

(Image: Daily Mirror)

"But he's doing well in drama so that's good."

The star admitted that the rest of the kids are doing "amazing" when asked how they were, and confessed Junior is catching up to his height.

Speaking about wife Emily, he said she couldn't be there tonight as she was working.

(Image: Ken McKay/ITV/REX)

"She's working, she's at the hospital - and it's a shame because every Monday she works - and it's always a Monday.

"But I always want to be here anyway, it's such an important night."

Peter also said revealed he's a big fan of the Pride of Britain Awards, as he said it gets "bigger and better" every year, and he understands why it's "so successful".

(Image: Ken McKay/ITV/REX)

"Every year I come it gets bigger and better, and I can understand why because everyone gets behind these things. They're finding unsung heroes everywhere - they're everywhere."

He added: "And I can understand why it's so successful."
description: EXCLUSIVE: Peter Andre has confessed son Junior will finish school before 'he can do what he likes'
